title: Save Your Smile and Your Money | Dr. Ingrid Murra
description:
A smile with straight teeth may be aesthetically pleasing, but did you know that straight teeth and a healthy bite can actually save you money? Dr. Ingrid Murra is an orthodontist and tells us all about the foundation of preventative oral healthcare, how you can go about achieving it, and she tackles the newfound myth that orthodontists are obsolete.

Dr. Ingrid Murra is an orthodontist out of Harvard Dental School, as well as the founder and CEO of an orthodontic startup, Two Front, which helps facilitate virtual-first practices in orthodontia and collaborating with dentists for office space. You can find her on Instagram @dringridmurra and find more about Two Front at mytwofront.com.
